We are ready to go very fast, so the faster you fill it out, the faster we will be able to provide the opinion to the European Council.‚Äô pic.twitter.com/2pVkxGf0By

‚Äî Oliver Varhelyi (@OliverVarhelyi) April 11, 2022

Republica Moldova a primit luni chestionarul de aderare la Uniunea EuropeanƒÉ.

Pre»ôedintele Klaus Iohannis i-a adresat o postare pe Twitter liderului Moldovei Maia Sandu, dupƒÉ √Ænm√¢narea chestionarului de cƒÉtre Comisia EuropeanƒÉ Moldovei ca rƒÉspuns la cererea de aderare a statului vecin.

Iohannis a declarat cƒÉ aceasta este o ‚ÄûetapƒÉ importantƒÉ a drumului european al Republicii Moldova, iar Rom√¢nia √Æi este alƒÉturi ≈üi √Æi oferƒÉ tot sprijinul sƒÉu".

√énm√¢narea de cƒÉtre Comisia EuropeanƒÉ @EU_Commission a chestionarului de aderare este o etapƒÉ importantƒÉ a drumului european ???????? al Republicii Moldova ????????, iar Rom√¢nia ???????? √Æi este alƒÉturi »ôi √Æi oferƒÉ tot sprijinul sƒÉu. @sandumaiamd ‚Äî Klaus Iohannis (@KlausIohannis) April 11, 2022

Nicu Popescu, ministrul afacerilor externe al Republicii Moldova, s-a √Ænt√¢lnit luni cu comisarul pentru vecinƒÉtate »ôi extindere Oliver Varhelyi la Luxemburg, pentru a ob»õine chestionarul.

‚ÄûRƒÉspunsurile pe care le vom oferi √ÆntrebƒÉrilor din acest chestionar vor reprezenta radiografia situa≈£iei noastre de moment, arƒÉt√¢nd c√¢t suntem de pregƒÉti≈£i pentru aderarea la Uniunea EuropeanƒÉ ≈üi, √Æn acela≈üi timp, ne vor indica unde trebuie sƒÉ depunem eforturi suplimentare,‚Äú a spus Popescu.

Questionnaire handover by European Commissioner @OliverVarhelyi @EU_Commission, to @nicupopescu, Minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration of #Moldova, on the sidelines of today's #ForeignAffairs Council, in #Luxembourg.https://t.co/2YKAA37zyt ‚Äî EU Council TV News (@EUCouncilTVNews) April 11, 2022

‚Äû≈¢ara noastrƒÉ √Æ≈üi accelereazƒÉ parcursul european,‚Äú a adƒÉugat acesta pe Facebook.

Popescu a spus cƒÉ Moldova este parte din Europa nu doar geografic, ci »ôi din punct de vedere al identitƒÉ»õii, »ôi valorilor, fƒÉc√¢nd referire la folosirea limbii rom√¢ne.

‚ÄûNe a»ôteaptƒÉ o perioadƒÉ de muncƒÉ intensƒÉ, a»ôa cƒÉ √Æncep√¢nd de astƒÉzi de c√¢nd am primit chestionarul, institu»õiile sunt pregƒÉtite pentru a furniza informa»õiile necesare √Æn cel mai scurt timp.

‚ÄûVom implica √Æn acest proces nu numai autoritƒÉ»õile, ci »ôi societatea noastrƒÉ civilƒÉ pentru cƒÉ aderarea la Uniunea EuropeanƒÉ reprezintƒÉ un proiect de »õarƒÉ care vizeazƒÉ viitorul fiecƒÉruia dintre noi.

‚ÄûOdatƒÉ √Æn plus dorim sƒÉ demonstrƒÉm cƒÉ suntem o »õarƒÉ √Æn care democra»õia func»õioneazƒÉ, reformele sunt posibile, procesele de transformare dau rezultate, iar viitorul nostru european este ireversibil,‚Äú a mai spus acesta.

La √Ænceputul lunii martie, Maia Sandu a semnat cererea de aderare a Moldovei la Uniunea EuropeanƒÉ, la doar c√¢teva zile dupƒÉ ce pre»ôedintele Ucrainei Volodimir Zelenski a fƒÉcut acest pas.

ArƒÉt√¢nd documentul semnat camerelor de filmat, aceasta a spus cƒÉ ‚Äûa durat 30 de ani ca Moldova sƒÉ ajungƒÉ la maturitate‚Äú, dar cƒÉ »õara este ‚Äûgata sƒÉ preia responsabilitatea asupra propriului sƒÉu viitor‚Äú, conform Reuters.

‚ÄûVrem sƒÉ trƒÉim √Æn pace, prosperitate, sƒÉ fim parte a lumii libere. √én timp ce unele decizii necesitƒÉ timp, altele trebuie fƒÉcute rapid »ôi decisive, profit√¢nd de oportunitƒÉ»õile care se ivesc odatƒÉ cu schimbƒÉrile lumii,‚Äú a mai spus Sandu.

Pe l√¢ngƒÉ Moldova »ôi Ucraina, »ôi Georgia, fostƒÉ republicƒÉ sovieticƒÉ, a aplicat luna trecutƒÉ sƒÉ devinƒÉ membru al Uniunii Europene, √Æn urma invaziei ruse»ôti a Ucrainei.

US, Pentagon "aware of social media reports which claim Russian forces deployed a potential chemical munition in Mariupol, Ukraine" "We cannot confirm at this time & will continue to monitor" per @PentagonPresSec "These reports, if true, are deeply concerning‚Äù

Foreign Secretary Liz Truss:Reports that Russian forces may have used chemical agents in an attack on the people of Mariupol. We are working urgently with partners to verify details. Any use of such weapons would be a callous escalation in this conflict and we will hold Putin and his government to account

3 wounded after exposure to chemical substance dropped from drone in Mariupol. All in mild condition

Azov regiment says Russian troops used kind of chemical dropped from a drone, those impacted have respiratory failure, vestibulo-atactic syndrome

3 days long curfew starting tomorrow morning to be imposed in Irpin, Kyiv region

France expels six suspected Russian spies in diplomatic roles, official says

ustrian chancellor: It is important to confront Putin with the facts in Ukraine

Austrian chancellor: Talks with Putin were not friendly

* -* -* -* - 3 killed, 8 wounded today as result of Russian shelling in Donetsk region of Ukraine* -* - 4354 people were evacuated today to the safe areas* - 8 killed, including 13y.o child, 19 wounded, including 4y.o. and 9y.o children as result of Russian army shelling today in Kharkiv* - Ukrainian Deputy Prime Minister: Russia prevented evacuations from Donetsk region today* -* -* - The Pentagon: We make about 10 trips to Ukraine a day to transport military aid* - Russian troops attempting to assault Severodonetsk and have launched Tochka-U missile at Popasna - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine* - The New York Times documented the bodies of almost three dozen people where they were killed in Bucha ‚Äî in their homes, in the woods, in a vacant parking lot ‚Äî and learned the story behind many of their deaths* - Shelling targeting Kharkiv* - Russian occupation authorities declared "high terrorist threat alert" in Crimea* - Russian military column near Rostov* - A* -* - WTO: The war in Ukraine could cut world trade in half this year* - Austrian leader has 'open and tough' talks with Putin in Moscow* - The European Union accuses Russia of "causing hunger in the world" through its war on Ukraine* - High terrorist alert level has been introduced in two districts of the Krasnodar Krai, bordering Ukraine by sea, the governor said.* - 30 houses damaged in Mykhailivka village of Pokrovsk district as result of artillery shelling today* - Indian Prime Minister assures Biden that the situation in Ukraine is very worrying* - Indian Prime Minister: We proposed to Moscow to hold talks between the Russian and Ukrainian presidents* - Indian Prime Minister: We will send a new batch of medical aid to Ukraine soon* - The meeting between Chancellor @karlnehammer and Putin is over after 75 minutes. At Austrian request, there were no joint pictures and no joint press statement* - No plans to bring more #Ukraine troops to US for training, per a senior US defense official Group of troops that just returned - to whom @SecDef spoke Sunday - had been in the US since Nov-Dec 2021* - Smoke rising near Olenivka* - Chairman of @thejointstaff Chiefs Gen. Mark Milley spoke with Commander-in-Chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces Gen. Valery Zaluzhny yesterday by phone- Milley emphasized that the US is united with Allies and partners in their resolve to support Ukraine* - 1 killed as result of Russian army shelling on Lysychansk with heavy weapons

As a reminder

Just so people know and understand. Information from war zones can become confusing as there will no doubt be info released from the players (on both sides) involved that might not necessarily be true.

As such take everything as a possibility and NOT as absolute truth.

The very first casualty in a war is the truth and all warfare is based on deception
